name: Cubenomics - A Cube and Ball Puzzle Game
name_original: Cubenomics - A Cube and Ball Puzzle Game
description:
First Demo of the game.

The game currently lacks a tutorial.  Please read the controls below and consider starting and playing the puzzles in order.

A quick look through the settings (Top right cog icon) may help as well.

Controls:

WD / Left Right Arrows : Rotate Puzzle Cube

Left Click: Draw on Cube

Left Click (Swipe on bottom third of screen): Rotate Puzzle Cube

Right Click (HOLD and drag): Rotate cube for free view of puzzle

Space/Enter (or Press the Play Button): Drop the ball to solve the puzzle
